message.body: Hi######## do you use Mac or PC? Would you be interested in a one day gig (English transcription for subtitles)?
Hi ###### I use a Mac and yes I can do transcription for a day for you.
Thanks. I'll email you all the info tonight.
I sent you an email with the info. Take a look at it and let me know if you can get in contact with Jacob. You can call him at any time, he's expecting your call. Thank you very much.
Great, I won't be able to get to it tonight but will contact him tomorrow. Thanks
